Author: jl777c#5810
Content: sapling -> taddr never allowed, sprout -> taddr allowed, taddr -> taddr not allowed, all excepting notary addresses

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the bug fix I made has it so the mining node needs to mine blocks for it to send headers, i think

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the other node should be printing                 fprintf(stderr,"request headers from failed process block peer\n");

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so the mining node mines a block, broadcasts it, the other peers get an error and then request headers

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: make sure to use the latest version as a basis

Content: just fixed a taddr -> taddr hole
